name: Creamy Fish Chowder
author: RAdams
summary: This is my ABSOLUTE FAVORITE warm soup for a cold winter night, and it's almost better as leftovers! Very easy and quick. This soup is perfect for almost any white fish.
directions: Cook and stir bacon in a soup pot over medium heat until bacon is browned and crisp, about 8 minutes
Stir onion into bacon and cook, stirring often, until onion is translucent, about 5 more minutes
Pour water into bacon mixture and stir in potatoes
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 10 minutes
Place cod fillets into simmering mixture and cook until fish is opaque and flakes easily, about 10 minutes
Stir milk, evaporated milk, butter, salt, and black pepper into pot
Bring soup to a boil; remove from heat and serve
